channel.title: Comments on: Lady McDonald Residence – 321 South Bunker Hill Avenue

item.title: By: Mohamed Prescott
item.dc:creator: Mohamed Prescott
item.description: Good evening, I was just on your website and filled out your "contact us" form. The "contact us" page on your site sends you these messages via email which is the reason you are reading my message at this moment correct? That's the holy grail with any type of advertising, making people actually READ your ad and this is exactly what you're doing now! If you have an advertisement you would like to blast out to tons of websites via their contact forms in the U.S. or anywhere in the world let me know, I can even target your required niches and my charges are very reasonable. Send a reply to: danialuciano8439@gmail.com

item.title: By: karwelis
item.dc:creator: karwelis
item.description:
here's an interesting bit of trivia about this house, it had an elevator!
jean karwelis
bunker hill is worth the effort
